name: First Savings Financial Group, Inc.
description: First Savings Financial Group, Inc. is a publicly traded holding company that primarily operates through its wholly owned subsidiary, First Savings Bank. Established in 2006 and headquartered in Jeffersonville, Indiana, the company focuses on providing a full range of financial services, including traditional banking, mortgage lending, and wealth management solutions. First Savings Bank is dedicated to serving its customers with a commitment to personalized service and community involvement. The bank offers various deposit products, such as checking accounts, savings accounts, and certificates of deposit, alongside a wide array of loan products including residential mortgages, commercial loans, and home equity lines of credit. With an emphasis on technology and innovation, First Savings Financial Group has made significant investments in digital banking services to enhance customer experience and accessibility. The company aims to foster long-term relationships with its clients while contributing to the economic development of the communities it serves. With a strong capital position and a proactive approach to risk management, First Savings Financial Group is well-positioned for growth in the competitive banking sector.

seo.meta_description: Explore First Savings Financial Group, Inc., a leading provider of banking and financial services. Discover our commitment to community and personal banking.

faq.question: What services does First Savings Financial Group offer?
faq.answer: First Savings Financial Group offers banking services, mortgage lending, and wealth management solutions.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of First Savings Financial Group?
faq.answer: Rick L. B. Morrow is the CEO of First Savings Financial Group, Inc.

faq.question: Where is First Savings Financial Group headquartered?
faq.answer: First Savings Financial Group is headquartered in Jeffersonville, Indiana, USA.

faq.question: What types of accounts can I open at First Savings Bank?
faq.answer: You can open checking accounts, savings accounts, and certificates of deposit at First Savings Bank.

faq.question: When was First Savings Financial Group founded?
faq.answer: First Savings Financial Group was founded in 2006.
